snippet: According to Canalys, a tech research firm, robust holiday sales of the iPad catapulted Apple ahead of Hewlett-Packard to make it the top PC company in the fourth quarter.

snippet: Although BlackBerry is a must-have accessory for the growing business class in the developing economies of the world and RIM is adding customers there at a healthy clip, the company faces a problem in its established markets. Businesses are lookin...
abstract: Although BlackBerry is a must-have accessory for the growing business class in the developing economies of the world and RIM is adding customers there at a healthy clip, the company faces a problem in its established markets. Businesses are looking for another option besides the BlackBerry. Apple is making its push into the enterprise. But analysts think that Samsung's Android phone are in the best position to profit.

headline.main: Daily Report: Businesses Look for a BlackBerry Substitute
